string.text:
This package contains various types of armor plates and components like kevlar and titanium in all shapes and sizes, and plenty of smaller components to attach and install them. With this kit you should be able to install any upgrade on an outfit related to improving its physical properties.

 %c[yellow]Can be used to upgrade:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Ballistic Res.
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Impact Res.
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Rupture Res.
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Suit durability
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Weight Reduction
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Explosive Res.

This package contains various types of materials resistant to extreme physical, biological and chemical conditions. With this kit you should be able to install any upgrade on an outfit related to improving its environmental protection.

 %c[yellow]Can be used to upgrade:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Radiation Res.
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Chemical Res.
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Burn Res.
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Electrical Res.
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Psychic Res.

This package contains fastening straps, assorted pouches, various mechanical devices of varying quality and other odds and ends. With this kit you should be able to install some useful upgrades on outfits.

 %c[yellow]Can be used to upgrade:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Weight carried
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Belt slots
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Stamina Recovery
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Health Restoration
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Bleeding Control
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Servomotor Boosters

This package contains high-quality weapon components and tools used to tweak weapon mechanisms. With this kit you should be able to make a variety of internal improvements to a weapon.

 %c[yellow]Can be used to upgrade:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Reliability
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Recoil reduction
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Rate of Fire
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Caliber change
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Fire modes

This package contains tools used to modify and maintain weapon barrels as well as tactical rails, mounts, and assorted bits of weapon furniture. With this kit you should be able to make a variety of upgrades related to weapon barrels or bodies.

 %c[yellow]Can be used to upgrade:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Flatness
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Accuracy
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Handling
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Weapon weight
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Attachment points
This package contains high quality lenses and optics suitable for replacement on binoculars and rifle scopes. With this kit you should be able to upgrade any optical instrument.
Chance existing upgrade kits get replaced with the new generic kits.
